title: Import everything from TypeApp
creator: mygarage1991
content:
I use TypeApp on my android phone. If I install Thunderbird (which I have been using for years on my PC--love it, but unrelated to this question) on my phone, can I import everything from TypeApp into Thunderbird mobile and quit TypeApp?

Thanks in advance.

Jon

title: 有没有支持翻译功能？
content: 希望能添加翻译功能，在面对不同语言的邮件时候我不需要自己再复制一遍翻译

title: incoming mail on my Lenovo tablet goes to trash folder
creator: Longstaff
content: I have just installed Thunderbird on my Lenovo tablet. My incoming mail is apparently going into the trash folder. I can't find anything in the settings to redirect it.
